member.name: T:ClipNotes.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:ClipNotes.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ClipNotes.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:ClipNotes.My.Resources.Resources.About
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to ClipNotes version 1.0 build 160227
Created by Gerard Balaoro gerardbalaoro@outlook.com
The MIT License Copyright (c) 2016. All Rights Reserved.

member.name: P:ClipNotes.My.Resources.Resources.Help
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Recording (Clipboard Recording) -records copied texts automatically. Classic Method (for Recording) -records text copied to clipboard. Unclassic Method (Content-Aware) -use to avoid redundancy/repeating items. -Removes text formatting (i.e. Bold, Italic).
- OPTIONS -------------------------------------------- Start Recording on Startup -start recording items from app launch. Use Classic Recording -enable to use Classic Method. Keep on Top -keep ClipNotes on top of all other windows [rest of string was truncated]";.
